jobs.additionalPlain:
😊 Benefits & Perks

💰 Competitive salary
🌎 Multi-cultural & diverse team
🎓 Numerous opportunities to present/attend top AI/OSS/industry conference
🦄 Rapid career development opportunities alongside the company
🏢 Central office in downtown Berlin, Shenzhen, Beijing
⛱️ Free snacks & drinks, monthly team events, flexible working hours, home office options
💻 Macbooks & top-notch equipment
✉️ Recommendation letter 


💼 Hiring Process

Candidates can expect the hiring process to follow the order below. Please keep in mind that candidates can be declined from the position at any stage of the process. 

- The first round is the CV screening, candidates will receive an email that contains a link for booking the next round. This process takes a maximum of one week.

- Qualified candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute screening call specifically on Zoom with one of our global recruiters.

- Next, candidates will be invited to a Team Peer Interview. During the interview, which will last 1 hour, the team will examine your fundamental knowledge and experience as well as your motivation to join Jina AI; If you are applying for an Engineering Internship, one should also expect a live-coding challenge in 10 to 15 minutes.

We will collect the feedback from all interviewers and make a decision in a maximum of two weeks (on average it takes 5 working days). Then the candidate will be invited to another 15-minute call with our recruiters to discuss the terms of the offer.

jobs.descriptionPlain:
Why an Internship at Jina AI? 

Our Internship Programme is designed to give students and fresh graduates a true insight into real enterprise experience.  When joining us, you'll be immersed in a collaborative and innovative workplace.  Throughout the internship, you'll assume real responsibilities, work on live projects, expand your professional network, and receive guidance and mentorship from our talented team.

What to expect? 

This internship is designed to provide you with valuable hands-on experience, mentorship, and exposure to cutting-edge technologies that are shaping the future of AI.

Here is a quick overview on how your internship journey will look with us: 

📅 Orientation and Welcome: On your first days, we will welcome you to our office and we will start the introduction and orientation to immerse you in our company culture, values, and mission. No need to worry about feeling lost – we've got your back with thorough training and onboarding, ensuring you have the knowledge and skills to excel.

🤝 Introductions: You'll have the opportunity to meet and connect with key team members and department heads, which will help you to integrate more!

🚀 Real Projects from the Start:  We'll set clear goals and performance expectations, providing you with a sense of direction and purpose throughout your internship, while working on a real project. 

👥 Buddy or Mentor System: Of course, you will not do all these alone! We'll match you with a supportive buddy or mentor who will be your go-to guide, offering insights, feedback, and support every step of the way.

🗣️ Regular Check-ins and Feedback: Communication is key! We'll have regular check-ins to make sure you fill supported. 

Who do we look for? 

We embrace diversity and welcome individuals from various profiles and backgrounds. Our Internship Programme is available in the following departments:

- Engineering (Software engineering, web development, Machine Learning...)
- Design (Creative Design, UX/UI Designer, Content Creation...)
- Product Management
- Sales and Account Management 
- Marketing, Events Manager
- Customer Satisfaction, Community Manager 

Timeliness 

Thank you for your interest in our Internship Programme! We appreciate your enthusiasm and are excited to welcome you into our dynamic team. We want to provide you with some important information regarding the application process and timeline.

If you are applying for a later internship season, rest assured that we will reach out to you as the time draws closer. Your application will be carefully reviewed when we begin the selection process for that specific season. We appreciate your patience as we handle applications in a timely manner to ensure fairness and consideration for all candidates.

While we appreciate every application, we may not be able to accept all candidates due to limited positions and specific requirements for each season. If your profile does not match our current needs, you will receive a rejection within the initial weeks after your application submission.

Our preferred duration of the internships is at least 4 -6 months to ensure you have ample time to delve deep into your role and maximize your learning.

🍁 Autumn Season: Secure your spot for September, October, or November

📅 Orientation and Welcome: On your first days, we will welcome you to our office and we will start the introduction and orientation to immerse you in our company culture, values, and mission. No need to worry about feeling lost – we've got your back with thorough training and onboarding, ensuring you have the knowledge and skills to excel.

🤝 Introductions: You'll have the opportunity to meet and connect with key team members and department heads, which will help you to integrate more!

🚀 Real Projects from the Start: We'll set clear goals and performance expectations, providing you with a sense of direction and purpose throughout your internship, while working on a real project.

👥 Buddy or Mentor System: Of course, you will not do all these alone! We'll match you with a supportive buddy or mentor who will be your go-to guide, offering insights, feedback, and support every step of the way.

🗣️ Regular Check-ins and Feedback: Communication is key! We'll have regular check-ins to make sure you fill supported.

Who do we look for?

We embrace diversity and welcome individuals from various profiles and backgrounds. Our Internship Programme is available in the following departments:

- Engineering (Software engineering, web development, Machine Learning...)
- Design (Creative Design, UX/UI Designer, Content Creation...)
- Product Management
- Sales and Account Management
- Marketing, Events Manager
- Customer Satisfaction, Community Manager

Timeliness 

Thank you for your interest in our Internship Programme! We appreciate your enthusiasm and are excited to welcome you into our dynamic team. We want to provide you with some important information regarding the application process and timeline.

If you are applying for a later internship season, rest assured that we will reach out to you as the time draws closer. Your application will be carefully reviewed when we begin the selection process for that specific season. We appreciate your patience as we handle applications in a timely manner to ensure fairness and consideration for all candidates.

While we appreciate every application, we may not be able to accept all candidates due to limited positions and specific requirements for each season. If your profile does not match our current needs, you will receive a rejection within the initial weeks after your application submission.

Our preferred duration of the internships is at least 4 -6 months to ensure you have ample time to delve deep into your role and maximize your learning.

❄️ Winter Season: Get ready to embrace December, January, or February

jobs.additionalPlain:
😊 Benefits & Perks

💰 Competitive salary & stock options
🌎 Multi-cultural & diverse team
🎓 Numerous opportunities to present/attend top AI/OSS/industry conference
🦄 Rapid career development opportunities alongside the company
🏢 Central office in downtown Berlin, Shenzhen, Beijing
⛱️ Free snacks & drinks, monthly team events, flexible working hours, home office options
💻 Macbooks & top-notch equipment


💼 Hiring Process

Candidates can expect the hiring process to follow the order below. Please keep in mind that candidates can be declined from the position at any stage of the process. 

- The first round is the CV screening, candidates will receive an email that contains a link for booking the next round. This process takes a maximum of one week.

- Qualified candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute screening call specifically on Zoom with one of our global recruiters. For engineering candidates, after this interview candidates will receive an email and be asked to complete an offline code challenge. On average the candidates can finish it in 30 minutes.

- Next, candidates will be invited to schedule a 1h Peer Interview, in which they will present a case study, as well as their experience and motivation to join Jina AI. 

We will collect the feedback from all interviewers and make a decision in a maximum of two weeks (on average it takes 5 working days). Then the candidate will be invited to another 15-minute call with our recruiters to discuss the terms of the offer.

jobs.descriptionPlain:
🙌 Who are we?

Founded in February 2020, Jina AI has swiftly emerged as a global pioneer in multimodal AI technology. Within an impressive timeframe of 20 months, we have successfully raised $37.5M, marking our strong position in the AI industry. Our ground-breaking technology, open-sourced on GitHub, has empowered over 40,000 developers around the globe to seamlessly build and deploy sophisticated multimodal applications.

In 2023, we've made significant strides in advancing AI generation tools grounded on multimodal technology. This innovation has benefited over 250,000 users worldwide, catering to a plethora of unique business requirements. From facilitating business growth and enhancing operational efficiency to optimizing costs, Jina AI is dedicated to empowering businesses to excel in the multimodal era.


✨ Who do we want?

- You are passionate about multimodal intelligence and making it accessible to everyone.
- You want to work with the latest technologies and are fascinated by AI/ML.
- You are a fast learner and a team player and enjoy working in an async, distributed environment.
- You are proactive and take ownership of your projects.
- You have excellent communication skills in English.

💁 About this position

We are in search of an enthusiastic Junior Sales Specialist with full proficiency in German to become a vital part of our team, where you'll spearhead the sales initiatives for our AI Generated Content tools and enterprise products.
As a key player in our team, your mission will be to identify and engage with potential customers, deeply understanding their unique pain points, and ultimately converting them into valued clients. We're looking for a self-driven professional who excels at working independently, and who brings outstanding communication and negotiation skills to the table. If you're ready to embark on an exciting journey with us, this could be the perfect opportunity.

Within an impressive timeframe of 20 months, we have successfully raised $37.5M, marking our strong position in the AI industry. Our ground-breaking technology, open-sourced on GitHub, has empowered over 40,000 developers around the globe to seamlessly build and deploy sophisticated multimodal applications.

In 2023, we've made significant strides in advancing AI generation tools grounded on multimodal technology. This innovation has benefited over 250,000 users worldwide, catering to a plethora of unique business requirements. From facilitating business growth and enhancing operational efficiency to optimizing costs, Jina AI is dedicated to empowering businesses to excel in the multimodal era.


✨ Who do we want?

- You are passionate about multimodal intelligence and making it accessible to everyone.
- You want to work with the latest technologies and are fascinated by AI/ML.
- You are a fast learner and a team player and enjoy working in an async, distributed environment.
- You are proactive and take ownership of your projects.
- You have excellent communication skills in English.

💁 About this position

We are in search of an enthusiastic Junior Sales Specialist with full proficiency in German to become a vital part of our team, where you'll spearhead the sales initiatives for our AI Generated Content tools and enterprise products.
As a key player in our team, your mission will be to identify and engage with potential customers, deeply understanding their unique pain points, and ultimately converting them into valued clients. We're looking for a self-driven professional who excels at working independently, and who brings outstanding communication and negotiation skills to the table. If you're ready to embark on an exciting journey with us, this could be the perfect opportunity.

lists.content:
• Identify Target Markets: Conduct market research to identify potential customer groups and product market fit for both Embedding product and PromptPerfect, leveraging insights for lead generation.
  • Engage Prospective Customers: Initiate prospecting calls and emails to introduce our products to potential customers, showcasing their value and benefits.
  • Solution-Oriented Approach: Understand customer pain points and specific usage scenarios to tailor effective solutions, addressing their unique needs.
  • Build Customer Relationships: Develop and nurture strong, enduring relationships with customers, fostering trust and loyalty.
  • Achieve Sales Goals: Consistently meet or exceed sales targets and quotas, demonstrating a results-driven approach.
  • Collaborative Marketing: Collaborate closely with the marketing and product teams to create impactful sales materials and campaigns, aligning messaging with customer needs.
  • Represent the Company: Attend conferences and events to effectively represent the company's products, establishing a presence in the industry and expanding our reach.

• Educational Background: Bachelor's degree in business or a related field.
  • Proven B2B Sales Experience: Demonstrated track record in B2B sales, preferably within the technology industry.
  • Technical Acumen: Proficiency in understanding technical terminology, particularly in the field of AI.
  • Communication and Negotiation Skills: Strong communication and negotiation abilities to engage effectively with clients.
  • Independence and Time Management: Capacity to work independently, efficiently manage time, and meet deadlines.
  • Customer-Centric Focus: Skill in identifying and comprehending customer pain points to offer tailored solutions.
  • Organizational and Problem-Solving Skills: Strong organizational skills with the capability to navigate complex challenges.
  • Adaptability: Eagerness to learn and adapt to emerging technologies and industry trends.
  • Collaborative Team Player: Collaborative mindset with exceptional organizational skills to liaise across business functions and provide stakeholders with project and campaign updates.
  • Language Proficiency: Native German speaker or a minimum of C1-C2 German proficiency level, with fluency in English being essential.
  • Familiarity with Tools: Experience with tools like Google Analytics, HubSpot, Sales Navigator, and similar platforms.

jobs.additionalPlain:
😊 Benefits & Perks

💰 Competitive salary & stock options
🌎 Multi-cultural & diverse team
🎓 Numerous opportunities to present/attend top AI/OSS/industry conference
🦄 Rapid career development opportunities alongside the company
🏢 Central office in downtown Berlin, Shenzhen, Beijing
⛱️ Free snacks & drinks, monthly team events, flexible working hours, home office options
💻 Macbooks & top-notch equipment


💼 Hiring Process

Candidates can expect the hiring process to follow the order below. Please keep in mind that candidates can be declined from the position at any stage of the process. 

- The first round is the CV screening, candidates will receive an email that contains a link for booking the next round. This process takes a maximum of one week.

- Qualified candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute screening call specifically on Zoom with one of our global recruiters. For engineering candidates, after this interview candidates will receive an email and be asked to complete an offline code challenge. On average the candidates can finish it in 30 minutes.

- Next, candidates will be invited to schedule a 45min Peer Interview, followed by a 45min Team Peer Interview. 

- Finally, candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute interview with COO.

We will collect the feedback from all interviewers and make a decision in a maximum of two weeks (on average it takes 5 working days). Then the candidate will be invited to another 15-minute call with our recruiters to discuss the terms of the offer.

jobs.descriptionPlain:
🙌 Who are we?

-A commercial open-source company that empowers businesses and developers to create cutting-edge neural search, generative AI, and multimodal services using state-of-the-art LMOps, MLOps, and cloud-native technologies
- Founded in Feb. 2020, raised $37.5M in 20 months. Now a global team of 65 with three offices: Berlin (HQ), Shenzhen, and Beijing.
- One of the high-valued & high-potential AI startups in the world, featured on Forbes DACH AI30 2020, CBInsights AI 100 2021 & 2022.


✨ Who do we want?

- You are passionate about multimodal intelligence and making it accessible to everyone.
- You want to work with the latest technologies and are fascinated by AI/ML.
- You are a fast learner and a team player and enjoy working in an async, distributed environment.
- You are proactive and take ownership of your projects.
- You have excellent communication skills in English.

💁 About this position

Are you passionate about working with cutting-edge AI technology? Join our dynamic team as an Intern Marketing Specialist and embark on a journey to elevate our brand through the power of influencer partnerships. If you're creative, tech-savvy, and ready to make a significant impact, this opportunity has your name on it!
jobs.description:
🙌 Who are we?

-A commercial open-source company that empowers businesses and developers to create cutting-edge neural search, generative AI, and multimodal services using state-of-the-art LMOps, MLOps, and cloud-native technologies
- Founded in Feb. 2020, raised $37.5M in 20 months. Now a global team of 65 with three offices: Berlin (HQ), Shenzhen, and Beijing.

✨ Who do we want?

- You are proactive and take ownership of your projects.
- You have excellent communication skills in English.

💁 About this position

Are you passionate about working with cutting-edge AI technology? Join our dynamic team as an Intern Marketing Specialist and embark on a journey to elevate our brand through the power of influencer partnerships. If you're creative, tech-savvy, and ready to make a significant impact, this opportunity has your name on it!

lists.content:
• Identify and research potential influencers who align with the company's brand and target audience.
  • Expand our database of influencers with relevant contact information and social media profiles.
  • Personalize outreach to influencers and express genuine interest in collaborating with them.
  • Assist in the negotiation and drafting of contracts or agreements with influencers, specifying terms, deliverables, compensation, and timelines.
  • Use data analytics tools to gather insights from influencer marketing campaign results and make data-driven recommendations for improvement.
  • Collaborate with the marketing team to develop marketing campaigns and strategies that align with the overall marketing goals and product launches.

• You have a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Marketing, Business, or a related discipline.
  • You are fast-learning, sharp-minded, and interested in technology and AI.
  • You have good interpersonal and communication skills and know how to communicate with different stakeholders.
  • Some experience in identifying channels to best contact community members and influencers online and offline.
  • Experience in community outreach, to try some marketing/outreach ideas gather feedback, and optimize outreach.
  • A fluent level of English, and German is a big plus.

jobs.additionalPlain:
😊 Benefits & Perks

💰 Competitive salary
🌎 Multi-cultural & diverse team
🎓 Numerous opportunities to present/attend top AI/OSS/industry conference
🦄 Rapid career development opportunities alongside the company
🏢 Central office in downtown Berlin, Shenzhen, Beijing
⛱️ Free snacks & drinks, monthly team events, flexible working hours, home office options
💻 Macbooks & top-notch equipment


💼 Hiring Process

Candidates can expect the hiring process to follow the order below. Please keep in mind that candidates can be declined from the position at any stage of the process. 

- The first round is the CV screening, candidates will receive an email that contains a link for booking the next round. This process takes a maximum of one week.

- Qualified candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute screening call specifically on Zoom with one of our global recruiters.

- Next, candidates will be invited to a Technical Peer Interview. During the interview, which will last 1 hour, the team will examine your fundamental knowledge and coding skills as well as your motivation to join Jina AI; one should also expect a live-coding challenge in 10 to 15 minutes.

We will collect the feedback from all interviewers and make a decision in a maximum of two weeks (on average it takes 5 working days). Then the candidate will be invited to another 15-minute call with our recruiters to discuss the terms of the offer.

-A commercial open-source company that empowers businesses and developers to create cutting-edge neural search, generative AI, and multimodal services using state-of-the-art LMOps, MLOps, and cloud-native technologies
- Founded in Feb. 2020, raised $37.5M in 20 months. Now a global team of 65 with three offices: Berlin (HQ), Shenzhen, and Beijing.

- You are a fast learner and a team player and enjoy working in an async, distributed environment.
- You are proactive and take ownership of your projects.
- You have excellent communication skills in English.

💁 About this position

We are looking for a TypeScript engineer intern who will help us create evaluation scores for our Prompt Technology tools, to track the improvements over time. 

Please, note that we are looking for someone who can join us in our Berlin office and that we are not offering visa sponsorship for this role at the moment.
jobs.description:
🙌 Who are we?

-A commercial open-source company that empowers businesses and developers to create cutting-edge neural search, generative AI, and multimodal services using state-of-the-art LMOps, MLOps, and cloud-native technologies
- Founded in Feb. 2020, raised $37.5M in 20 months. Now a global team of 65 with three offices: Berlin (HQ), Shenzhen, and Beijing.

- You are proactive and take ownership of your projects.
- You have excellent communication skills in English.

💁 About this position

We are looking for a TypeScript engineer intern who will help us create evaluation scores for our Prompt Technology tools, to track the improvements over time.

Please, note that we are looking for someone who can join us in our Berlin office and that we are not offering visa sponsorship for this role at the moment.

lists.content:
• You'd be an active team member in our engineering team and will assess in the creation of evaluation scores of our LLM outputs
  • You willl build up evaluation systems that run on CI
  • You will create graphics to track the evaluation scores of the different apps over time
  • You will ensure the evaluation system is adaptable, allowing for the addition of new apps or features over time

lists.text: Requirements for this position would include:
lists.content:
• We're looking for self-motivated and autonomous workers, who take ownership and initiative in their own work
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field. Advanced degrees may be preferred.
  • Individuals with >2 years of experience with TypeScript
  • Individuals with experience working with CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery) systems.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced, evolving environment
  • Excellent communication skills, with the ability to explain complex data to non-technical stakeholders.

Are you looking to kickstart your career in sales in the AI world? We are looking for a motivated Sales Intern to join us in our Berlin office. Within an impressive timeframe of 20 months, we have successfully raised $37.5M, marking our strong position in the AI industry. - You have excellent communication skills in English.

💁 About this position

Are you looking to kickstart your career in sales in the AI world? We are looking for a motivated Sales Intern to join us in our Berlin office. You will mainly focus on creating outbound reachouts, executing prospecting activities, and participating in sales calls to learn all about the sales life-cycle.

lists.content:
• Research and identify potential customers who would benefit from the company's AI products or services.
  • Use various channels, including social media, online research, and cold outreach, to create a list of leads.
  • You will experiment with A/B testing of messaging and outreach strategies to optimize conversion rates.
  • Collaborate with the sales and marketing team to ensure a consistent and coordinated approach to sales efforts.

• You have a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree with a focus on sales or marketing.
  • Interest in or understanding of B2B Sales processes in technology/AI companies.
  • You are ideally familiar with sales tools and technologies, such as CRM software (Sales Navigator, Hubspot…).
  • Strong interpersonal skills to build relationships with potential customers, colleagues, and other stakeholders.
  • Excellent English skills, and German is a big plus.

- Qualified candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute screening call specifically on Zoom with one of our global recruiters.

- Next, candidates will be invited to a Technical Peer Interview. During the interview, which will last 1 hour, the team will examine your fundamental knowledge and coding skills as well as your motivation to join Jina AI; one should also expect a live-coding challenge in 10 to 15 minutes.

We will collect the feedback from all interviewers and make a decision in a maximum of two weeks (on average it takes 5 working days). Then the candidate will be invited to another 15-minute call with our recruiters to discuss the terms of the offer.
jobs.descriptionPlain:
🙌 Who are we?

-A commercial open-source company that empowers businesses and developers to create cutting-edge neural search, generative AI, and multimodal services using state-of-the-art LMOps, MLOps, and cloud-native technologies
- Founded in Feb. 2020, raised $37.5M in 20 months. Now a global team of 65 with three offices: Berlin (HQ), Shenzhen, and Beijing.
- One of the high-valued & high-potential AI startups in the world, featured on Forbes DACH AI30 2020, CBInsights AI 100 2021 & 2022.


✨ Who do we want?

- You are passionate about multimodal intelligence and making it accessible to everyone.
- You want to work with the latest technologies and are fascinated by AI/ML.
- You are a fast learner and a team player and enjoy working in an async, distributed environment.
- You are proactive and take ownership of your projects.
- You have excellent communication skills in English.

💁 About this position

As a Software Engineer Intern you would get the opportunity in helping assist our engineering team in expanding our Neural search ecosystem, while gaining hands on experience on learning about and actively contributing to the opensource community.
jobs.description:
🙌 Who are we?

-A commercial open-source company that empowers businesses and developers to create cutting-edge neural search, generative AI, and multimodal services using state-of-the-art LMOps, MLOps, and cloud-native technologies
- Founded in Feb. 2020, raised $37.5M in 20 months. Now a global team of 65 with three offices: Berlin (HQ), Shenzhen, and Beijing.

✨ Who do we want?

- You are passionate about multimodal intelligence and making it accessible to everyone.
- You want to work with the latest technologies and are fascinated by AI/ML.
- You are a fast learner and a team player and enjoy working in an async, distributed environment.
- You are proactive and take ownership of your projects.

💁 About this position

As a Software Engineer Intern you would get the opportunity in helping assist our engineering team in expanding our Neural search ecosystem, while gaining hands on experience on learning about and actively contributing to the opensource community.

lists.content:
• You'd be an active team member in our engineering team and would assist them in building a Neural Search ecosystem in open source (https://get.jina.ai)
  • Assist in build integration & benchmark tools for Jina
  • Integrate port AI models (NLP, CV, ...) into Jina Hub
  • Assist in building innovative examples with Jina and publish blog posts
  • Assist in the improvement of tests & docstring coverage for Jina

lists.text: Requirements for this position would include:
lists.content:
• We're looking for self-motivated and autonomous workers, who take ownership and initiative in their own work
  • Individuals with >2 years Python experience
  • Individuals with experience in Docker, Bash, CICD
  • Active contributors to opensource projects
